item.title: Sketchbook: Rainbow, Dark forest & Double stars
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: This is my first drawing entry for my sketchbook. I’m sharing my progress as an artist publicly as a function of accountability for myself. Being inspired to pick up drawing by an idea for a collage that came to my head while I was in deep thought about present and future of my love relationship, I went out and bought some top quality art supplies to fuel the creative process.
